sections.description:
Companion plugin for the Merchandiser theme. Extends the functionality by adding theme specific features.

Gutenberg Blocks:

  • Banner
  • Image Slider
  • Blog Posts Grid
  • Blog Posts Slider
  • Social Media Profiles
sections.changelog:
1.2.1

  • Fixed: Columns Block displaying issue

1.2

  • WordPress 5+ compatibility improvements
  • Improved styles for theme neutrality
  • Localization issues with the Posts Grid and Posts Slider Blocks

1.1

  • WordPress 5+ compatibility improvements

1.0

  • Initial Version
